document_data.mainbody:
he Sable Forest was located on the Elemental Plane of Fire near the City of Brass. 
The Sable Forest was filled with large black trees called serpent trees. These trees were usually bare of leaves, taking their nourishment from heat instead of light.
Noble efreeti held hunts in the Sable Forest on a daily basis. Any unwelcome trespassers often found themselves run down by savage hell hounds.
